2. _T7 endonuclease I mutation detection assays_
  Purified or unpurified PCR products of target loci were for T7 endonuclease I \(T7EI) mutation detection assays as previously described 16.
refer: as previously described refers to the method or procedure for T7 endonuclease I mutation detection assays that was mentioned or explained earlier in the text.
